their so called Megatron is the true one, but hydras is the fused 
Megatron and Galvatron"

> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Scorponok aims at the enemy and opens his life pencer 
> > > > > claw/hand, 
> > > > > > > releasing a G2 rocket.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Scorponok: Today you have the honor of fighting a 
> > > Generation 
> > > > 2 
> > > > > > > Decepticon Headmaster!

> > > > > > > > Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Trelos quickly sidestepped the shot and as the Pred 
> moved 
> > > > > > > around to get as his flank he merely rotated as he ran, 
> > still 
> > > > > > facing 
> > > > > > > the intruder he got in close and leapt at the bot 
trying 
> > grab 
> > > > his 
> > > > > > > armor with his teeth and wrestle him to the ground.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > OOC: Just a few quick facts, if he'is trying to flank 
> > > Trelos, 
> > > > > he 
> > > > > > > has significantly more ground to cover than Trelos does 
> to 
> > > > rotate 
> > > > > > to 
> > > > > > > face him. Trelos can do combat with bots in beast mode, 
> his 
> > > > jaws 
> > > > > > > have been known to rip off arms and legs (necks too); 
his 
> > > front 
> > > > > > paws 
> > > > > > > can also slash armor. He runs faster than many bots 
fly, 
> > and 
> > > > he's 
> > > > > > > racked up quite a kill list already. He broke out of 
the 
> > > > > Pasificus 
> > > > > > > Maximal base without any assistance, while all the 
> Maximals 
> > > > were 
> > > > > in 
> > > > > > > the base, he's bested Hydras in combat. Don't take him 
> > > > lightly. :P
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > On Mon, Mar 10, 2008 at 11:35 AM, Super Cyclonus 
> > > > > > > <supercyclonus@> wrote:
> > > > > > > > As the Predacon base rose to the surface Myrmidon was 
> > > > > > > close behind
> > > > > > > > Trelos. He took a moment to look around as he 
carefully 
> > > > stepped 
> > > > > > onto
> > > > > > > > the the cooling surface, steam rising from the 
contact. 
> > > With 
> > > > the
> > > > > > > > slightest application of power, bosters flared and he 
> > rose 
> > > > > above 
> > > > > > the
> > > > > > > > muck. 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > He watched as Trelos ran at the new robot and watched 
> the 
> > > > > result, 
> > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > slight smile flitting across his face. With a flick 
of 
> > > > thought 
> > > > > he 
> > > > > > > began
> > > > > > > > transmitting what he saw to the command center, as he 
> > began 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > > approach
> > > > > > > > Malice. (OOC: Yes, Hydras should be able to see 
what's 
> > > going 
> > > > on)
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > "Who are you to invade our space with threats of 
> death?" 
> > > His 
> > > > > > voice 
> > > > > > > is
> > > > > > > > deep, a cross between a purr and a growl. 
> Shouldermounted 
> > > > motar 
> > > > > > > cannons
> > > > > > > > turned to orient on the necommer as he continued, "It 
> is 
> > > you 
> > > > > who 
> > > > > > > will
> > > > > > > > stand down, and you will do it *now*"
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Preston
> > > > > > > > (Myrmidon)
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@> wrote:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Malice:
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > After waiting for a while, the lava bed shifted and 
> > > rumbled 
> > > > > and 
> > > > > > > the
> > > > > > > > > fortress rose from the molten stone. Malice 
retreated 
> > to 
> > > > > stable
> > > > > > > > > ground and hid behind a rock outcropping. After the 
> > > > fortress 
> > > > > > > settled
> > > > > > > > > and a sentry exited to search- for himself he 
> assumed, 
> > he 
> > > > > > decided 
> > > > > > > to
> > > > > > > > > get the creature's attention. He leveled his rifle 
> and 
> > > > fired a
> > > > > > > > > careful shot in the beast's path only fet in front 
of 
> > > him, 
> > > > > then 
> > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > follow up shot behind it.
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > "That's far enough, Predacon. If you put your paws 
up 
> I 
> > > > won't
